mapper.select:
select si.StI_Status, si.StICode, si.VehicleID, si.GrWeight, si.TaWeight, si.NetWeight, si.Deduct ,u1.empname as oper1Name, u2.empname as oper2Name , si.DeductNum , si.Remarks , si.StI_Times as stlTimes , si.SecondTime , si.Sup_NetWeight , si.ClWeight , si.Sup_OilNum , si.FirstTime , si.Sup_ExFactory , ms.Sup_Name , mk.Sto_Name , mt.MatName , si.SaleType , vp.PI_TypeName as ptTypeName from MP_StockIn si left join dbo.MP_Supplier ms on si.SupCode = ms.SupCode and si.compid = ms.compid left join MP_Stock mk on mk.StkCode = si.StkCode and mk.compid = si.compid left join MP_MaterialInfor mt on si.MatCode = mt.MatCode and si.compid = mt.compid left join (SELECT PI_TypeName, PI_Values,compid FROM DD_PublicInfo where PI_Class = '30' and RecStatus = 1) vp on vp.PI_Values = si.SaleType and si.compid =vp.compid left join User_employee u1 on u1.opid = si.OPER1 and si.compid = u1.compid left join User_employee u2 on u2.opid = si.OPER2 and si.compid = u2.compid where si.compid = #{compid} and si.RecStatus=1
and vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and Sup_Name like '%'+#{supName}+'%'
and matName like '%'+#{matName}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
and si.saleType=#{saleType}
group by si.StI_Status, si.StICode, si.VehicleID, si.GrWeight, si.TaWeight, si.NetWeight, si.Deduct, u1.empname, u2.empname, si.DeductNum, si.Remarks, si.StI_Times, si.SecondTime, si.Sup_NetWeight, si.ClWeight, si.Sup_OilNum, si.FirstTime, si.Sup_ExFactory, ms.Sup_Name, mk.Sto_Name, mt.MatName, si.SaleType, vp.PI_TypeName order by si.StICode desc

select distinct MP_Supplier.Sup_Name supName,MP_StockIn.SupCode from MP_StockIn left join MP_Supplier on MP_StockIn.SupCode=MP_Supplier.SupCode and MP_StockIn.compid=MP_Supplier.compid where MP_Supplier.Sup_Name like
'%'+#{supName}+'%'
and MP_StockIn.compid =#{compid} and si.RecStatus=1

select distinct vp.PI_TypeName,MP_StockIn.SaleType from MP_StockIn left join (SELECT PI_TypeName, PI_Values FROM DD_PublicInfo where PI_Class = '30' and RecStatus = 1) AS vp on vp.PI_Values=MP_StockIn.SaleType where MP_StockIn.RecStatus=1

select distinct MP_Stock.Sto_Name,MP_StockIn.StkCode from MP_StockIn left join MP_Stock on MP_Stock.compid=MP_Stock.compid and MP_Stock.StkCode=MP_StockIn.StkCode where MP_Stock.compid=#{compid} and MP_StockIn.RecStatus=1
and MP_Stock.Sto_Name like '%'+#{supName}+'%'

select distinct MP_StockIn.MatCode, MP_MaterialInfor.MatName from MP_StockIn left join MP_MaterialInfor on MP_StockIn.MatCode=MP_MaterialInfor.MatCode where MP_StockIn.compid=#{compid} and MP_StockIn.RecStatus=1
and MP_MaterialInfor.MatName like '%'+#{supName}+'%'

select distinct empname as oper1Name,u.OpId,empname AS oper2Name from User_employee u left join User_position p on u.compid =p.compid and p.code ='50' where u.compid =#{compid} and u.useing =1
and u.empname like '%'+#{supName}+'%'

select DISTINCT vehicleId from MP_StockIn where compid=#{compid} and MP_StockIn.RecStatus=1
and vehicleId like '%'+#{supName}+'%'
